name: Dodge the Blocks (itch) (JohanGameDev)
description: Hi, I am an 8-year-old game dev. This is the first game I ever made so I hope it gets some downloads. I made this on an old computer so it might lack some features but if I can get a 1000$ for this game I will update the game and upload the new game here. So please support this game, Thank you.
